welcome_message_body: Welcome to Silivri, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and delicious seafood. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all the city has to offer and enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Olta Balık Restaurant
restaurants.description: Olta Balık Restaurant is a seafood restaurant located in İstanbul.
restaurants.address: Piri Mehmet Paşa Mah. Dalgakıran Mevkii No.2 Silivri, İstanbul

restaurants.name: Lokum Et & Kofte
restaurants.description: Lokum Et & Kofte is a steakhouse located in İstanbul.

restaurants.name: Karışık Pizza & Cafe
restaurants.description: Karışık Pizza & Cafe is a pizzeria located in Silivri.

restaurants.name: Sırrı Reis Balık Evi
restaurants.description: Sırrı Reis Balık Evi is a seafood restaurant located in İstanbul.

restaurants.name: Ciğerimin Köşesi Edirne Ciğercisi
restaurants.description: Ciğerimin Köşesi Edirne Ciğercisi is a turkish restaurant located in Silivri.
restaurants.address: Piri Mehmet Paşa Mah. Sanatkarlar Cad., 34570 Silivri

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Istanbul Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Istanbul Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
